channel.title: Birds on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Birds on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Birds
item.description: can i see behind those lines? it is hard. and it is tricky to do. i see to and want. to know? do you see me? do you see behind this curved line on my head that some claim a smile? do you see that it’s a wince that makes my face that way. do you see that pain that’s wedged within me. Foolish! How could I have done this.
